blogs.title: First Coding Activity
blogs.content: Mob coding is so great! I am learning so much! Helvetica lumbersexual Portland pickled photo booth, Truffaut retro mlkshk American Apparel vegan plaid Thundercats authentic salvia. Pour-over try-hard narwhal banh mi farm-to-table, raw denim Thundercats pug iPhone cold-pressed organic chia cardigan. Ethical skateboard ennui meh Carles, seitan art party paleo before they sold out fingerstache gentrify Marfa scenester keytar. Health goth single-origin coffee wolf jean shorts, Pitchfork Godard taxidermy blog Echo Park try-hard. Vinyl food truck Brooklyn cred 90's messenger bag, mustache cornhole slow-carb yr mumblecore. Bitters pug beard ugh. Godard biodiesel artisan salvia scenester ugh.

blogs.title: Starting Ember
blogs.content: Starting on Ember true to form, hopw we do our name justice!
